We're a cooperative skill-sharing group, focused on the outdoors. We tend to meet at local parks, farms, and town lands. Help us to build out our fall schedule by volunteering to offer a 'skill workshop'!

What we do

  • Explore nature together â€” hike local trails, notice wildlife, read the landscape.
  • Build useful things â€” real projects for homes, gardens, and the community.
  • Learn STEM â€” measure, design, test, and improve as we go.

Who it's for

  • Teens & adults who want to learn or share skills
  • Anyone excited about nature, building, and resilience

Example projects
